short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Emotionise.ai: Transform your communication with AI-powered empathy, ensuring you ALWAYS connect emotionally with your audience.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Emotionise.ai is a cutting-edge Chrome plugin that transforms the way you communicate online. It elevates your communication by infusing it with emotional intelligence, ensuring that every message you send and every conversation you prepare for engages emotionally. Perfect for emails, social media, town halls and sensitive conversations, Emotionise.ai helps you communicate with sincerity and inspires greater trust and increased emotional engagement with your audience. 

ðŸ‘‰ How it works
This extension analyzes your sentences as you write and adds underlines to each sentence, offering emotionally intelligent suggestions to help improve your communication outcomes. You can also select one or more sentences and Emotionise AI will rephrase them with increased emotional intelligence.
